project.name: IClick
project.description: Immediate Click suppolier for the browser across multiple devices

IClick.name: IClick
IClick.description:
This class provides a costume events that triggers immediately after
a user has clicked an element.
Class supports adding new drivers to allow multiple devices inputs.

params.name: root
params.description: if provided will use this element as root element

props.name: event_map
handlers

classitems.name: event_name
classitems.static: this is the name of the event that will be fired when an immediate click is triggered

classitems.description: whether or not to always prevent the real click event from firing
classitems.name: prevent_click

classitems.description: use this property within a driver to prevent the event from triggering
classitems.name: IClickPrevented

classitems.description: This property should be used by drivers to switch into the "active" stack
classitems.name: state

classitems.description: attaches IClick to the root element
classitems.name: attach

classitems.description: detaches IClick from the root element
classitems.name: detach

classitems.description: check if user moved indicator more than allowed
classitems.name: isMoved

classitems.description: reset IClick checks. remove all events handlers. Must be called on canceling states.
classitems.name: reset
